name: Battpoint
slogan: Phone charging solution with network of portable power banks
description:
Battpoint is an innovative solution to a modern day problem, finding yourself with a low battery. With a network of charging stations containing portable power banks, you can confidently leave the house and use your electronics without getting ‘low-battery anxiety’.

Both users and businesses can benefit from build out the network of charger stations and the use of the power banks.

Users benefit from:
* Best price on the UK market
* Never get battery anxiety 
* Locations all over London
* Able to stay connected and on the move

Businesses benefit from:
* Improve customer experience as it is another value add to provide
* Attracting customers through the app, when users location stations close by.
* Increase time and money spent at venue by customer
* Advertising opportunities on stations and power banks
* Revenue Share

jobs.title: Field Sales Professional
jobs.description:
•       Real Career Progression, Immediate Start
•	Early Stages of Market Adoption 
•	Strong Uncapped Commission Structure

Battpoint is an innovative solution to a modern day problem, finding yourself with a low battery. With a network of charging stations containing portable power banks, you can confidently leave the house and use your electronics without getting ‘low-battery anxiety’.

This is an exciting start-up opportunity and we are looking for salespeople to join the team and help us develop relationships here in London. You will be responsible for the whole sales process, from generating the leads through to the installation of the charging stations. The stations are free for venues, however, due to the start-up nature of the business, you’ll various other objections and situations to overcome. You would be joining at a time where you can play a pivotal role in the direction of the company and have a strong earning potential. 

This role will be on a self-employed basis, so there is flexibility around the hours worked. However, due to the growth plans in place, there will be a minimum requirement needed.  

Responsibilities/Skills Required:
•	A strong track record within B2B business development or sales roles
•	Experienced in field-based sales in London
•	Strong communication skills 
•	Autonomous and Proactive
•	Strategic Problem Solver
•	Resilient and Determined 
•	Experience with start-up sales (preferred)

You’ll be joining a close-knit team based out of Central London and be expected to lead from the start from Day 1. This will be a really challenging sales role so have a commission structure to attract the right calibre of people to the team. There are a lot of clients waiting for this product and a lot that don’t realise they need it, there is a huge opportunity in the market at the moment for this. Produce the results and you’ll be rewarded!
